blogPost.excerpt: We have 30 seconds of screen time during Super Bowl LVI. We want to give as many people as we can the chance to be on TV. Everyone who participates gets to send in a quick video, and we’ll play them all on TV during the Super Bowl.
blogPost.body: We have 30 seconds of screen time during Super Bowl LVI. We want to give as many people as we can the chance to be on TV. Everyone who participates gets to send in a quick video, and we’ll play them all on TV during the Super Bowl.
blogPost.title: Super Super Bowl Ad - We’ve got a Super Bowl 2022 ad and we are giving it to you
blogPost.author: Daniel Greenberg

localize.description: 在超级碗LVI期间，我们有30秒的屏幕时间。我们想给尽可能多的人上电视的机会。每个参与的人都可以发送一个快速的视频，我们将在超级碗期间在电视上播放它们。
localize.tagline: 我们有一个2022年超级碗的广告，我们把它送给你。

localize.description: 在超級碗LVI期間，我們有30秒的屏幕時間。我們想給儘可能多的人上電視的機會。每個參與的人都可以發送一個快速的視頻，我們將在超級碗期間在電視上播放它們。
localize.tagline: 我們有一個2022年超級碗的廣告，我們把它送給你。

previous.excerpt: Mirror iPhone/iPad to your Mac wirelessly. No need to connect iPhone/iPad to Mac with a cable. Demo what's on your iPhone/iPad in online meeting, play games, draw live. PhoneCast is a universal purchase app so you buy once and use it on iPhone, iPad and Mac.
previous.title: PhoneCast - Mirror iPhone or iPad screen to Mac without wires

localize.description: 镜像iPhone/iPad到你的Mac的无线。不需要用电缆将iPhone/iPad连接到Mac上。在在线会议上演示iPhone/iPad上的内容，玩游戏，现场绘画。PhoneCast是一个通用的购买应用程序，所以你购买一次，并在iPhone，iPad和Mac上使用它。
localize.tagline: 将iPhone或iPad屏幕镜像到Mac上，无需接线

localize.description: 鏡像iPhone/iPad到你的Mac的無線。不需要用電纜將iPhone/iPad連接到Mac上。在在線會議上演示iPhone/iPad上的內容，玩遊戲，現場繪畫。PhoneCast是一個通用的購買應用程序，所以你購買一次，並在iPhone，iPad和Mac上使用它。
localize.tagline: 將iPhone或iPad屏幕鏡像到Mac上，無需接線

next.excerpt: Reshift is a developer-first security tool that helps developers find and fix vulnerabilities in their custom JavaScript code.
next.title: Reshift Security - Find Vulnerabilities in Your JavaScript Code for Free!

localize.description: Reshift是一款以开发者为先的安全工具，可以帮助开发者发现并修复自定义JavaScript代码中的漏洞。
localize.tagline: 免费查找你的JavaScript代码中的漏洞!

localize.description: Reshift是一款以開發者爲先的安全工具，可以幫助開發者發現並修復自定義JavaScript代碼中的漏洞。
localize.tagline: 免費查找你的JavaScript代碼中的漏洞!
